title: Whatsapp glitches since security update March 2021
content:
Ever since my Phone installed the new Security Update March 2021.... my Whatsapp constantly stops working. Whatsapp would kick out and display a ' whatsapp keeps stopping' pop up. Also I do not get notifications from Whatsapp anymore. 

I have uninstalled the app, reinstalled it clean without pre-existing data. Force stopped it, opened it. Problem still remains. 

Frustrating ! if anyone can shed light onto this matter, it would be grateful.
